attributes.action: Ban dog breeding unless having a license and paying a yearly fee.
attributes.background: Countless dogs end up in rescues and kennels every year. Some remain in there for the rest of their lives through no fault of their own. People choose to go to breeders who breed for money rather than home dogs who are in need. Many dogs get put down because no one can find their surgery. Stop it!

rejection.details:
People already need a licence if they breed and sell dogs. This licence is valid for one year. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/dog-breeding-licence-england-scotland-wales

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to change. Alternatively, you may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/175089
